text: Her swutelað on ðissum gewrite þæt Ealdred biscop hæfþ geunnen Wulfgeate sumne dæl landes.

Þæt is oþer healf hid on ðam tune ðe Dicford is genamad to habbanne & to brucane ðreora manna dæg & æfter hyr dæge gange ðæt land eft agean to ðam ðe se wylle ðe ðonne bisceoprices wealde on Wigeraceastre.
& hig syn æfre underþeodde & gehersume & ðam hlafordscipe folhgien ðe ðonne bisceop beo.
& gif hig ænigne frambyge don ðolian ðære are.

& ðisses is to gewitnysse, eall se hired on Wigeraceastre & se hired on Eofeshamme & se hired on Persceoran & Leofric eorl & Odda eorl & Aelfric his broðor & Berhtric Ælfgares sunu & Owine & Wagan & Aeglric ðæs biscopes broðor & Ceolmær & Atsur & Esebearn & Ordwig & Aeþestan fætta & Aelfward æt Langadune & ealle ða yldestan ðegnas on Wigeraceastrescire, denisce & englisce.
& hredde he ða oðra healfe hida for are ðreora manna dæg to cinges banne.
